entry.title: Current Conditions: Partly Cloudy, 3.8°C

Visibility: 24.1 km

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries. High 6.
entry.summary: Flurries ending near noon then a mix of sun and cloud. Fog patches dissipating near noon. High 6. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Clearing before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High plus 1.
